code: import axios from"axios";const API_URL="http://localhost:5000/api/campaigns";export const getCampaigns=()=>axios.get(API_URL);export const addCampaign=data=>axios.post(API_URL,data);export const updateCampaignStatus=(id,status)=>axios.put("".concat(API_URL,"/").concat(id),{status});export const deleteCampaign=id=>axios.delete("".concat(API_URL,"/").concat(id));
